articles.description: Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma’s second child, Akaay, was born in London and there are speculations that he may gain UK citizenship due to his birth in England.
articles.content: Star Indian batter Virat Kohli and Bollywood actress Anushka Sharma announced the birth of their second child, Akaay, via Instagram on February 20. The celebrity couple has kept their location under … [+2075 chars]
